import React from 'react' import Button from '../components/Button'; const AboutUs = () => { const goals = [ { title: "Empowerment", desc: "blah blah blah blah blah blah" }, { title: "Empowerment", desc: "blah blah blah blah blah blah" }, { title: "Empowerment", desc: "blah blah blah blah blah blah" }, { title: "Empowerment", desc: "blah blah blah blah blah blah" } ] return (

Who we are and our Goals

Girls face numerous barriers and societal expectations that have limited their participation and representation in the traditionally male-dominated computer science and engineering fields. Through our free resources and engaging opportunities, we hope to ignite a lifelong passion for these fields.

{ goals.map((goal) => (

{goal.title}

)) }
) } export default AboutUs;
